frontmatter.title: His Power to Heal and Forgive
frontmatter.subtitle: Jesus Forgives Sins and Heals a Man Stricken with Palsy
frontmatter.excerpt: Jesus shows that He has power to both forgive sins and heal physical infirmities. Mark 2:1-12

frontmatter.title: Church Announces Plans for New Hymnbook and Children’s Songbook
frontmatter.subtitle: Plans announced for revised Hymnbook, Children’s Songbook
frontmatter.excerpt: Sacred music teaches the doctrines of the gospel, nourishes us spiritually, and has the power to unify Church members throughout the world. The Church has announced it is revising the hymnbook and children’s songbook and invites members to participate.

frontmatter.title: Gathering The Family Of God
frontmatter.subtitle: Family History enthusiasts share touching experiences they had while finding ancestors’
frontmatter.excerpt: Ordinary people from the San Francisco area share some of the inspiring experiences had while researching their ancestors and their stories. Ranging from finding documents against all odds, to discovering common feelings and even physical similarities, these remarkable stories motivate and inspire.

frontmatter.title: First Presidency Releases New Guidelines for Interviewing Youth
frontmatter.subtitle: New guidelines for interviewing youth and handbook of instructions have been updated
frontmatter.excerpt: Interviews provide opportunities to help youth become disciples of the Savior, repent of transgressions, and live the gospel of Jesus Christ.

frontmatter.title: Create Powerful, Visual Presentations with the Church’s Updated Media Library App
frontmatter.subtitle: The church has updated the Media Library app
frontmatter.excerpt: Whether you’re in charge of a Sunday School lesson, a family home evening, or a missionary discussion, with the LDS Media Library app you have an updated, comprehensive database of Church media at your fingertips.

frontmatter.title: A New Way to Refer a Friend to the Missionaries
frontmatter.subtitle: Share the gospel in new ways
frontmatter.excerpt: A new feature on the LDS Tools app and LDS.org lets you send referrals directly to missionaries.

frontmatter.title: Garment Styles Being Discontinued Must Be Ordered by June 30
frontmatter.subtitle: Select garment styles will be discontinued
frontmatter.excerpt: Beehive Clothing is preparing to introduce new garment products. To accommodate these upcoming changes, it will discontinue a small number of current garment styles for men and women by the end of October 2017.
